Liked: Large room, huge bathroom and shower, pillow selection directly from the TV. You can also order additional cosmetics (shampoo and shower gels), exercises and food from it. Perfectly clean, everything was brought very quickly on additional requests. They gave a room on the highest floor, despite the fact that the hotel is located in Trakia - the view is pleasant. Another plus is that you can open the window, despite the fifth floor :) At the reception, everyone is very friendly, like the woman who cooks in the restaurant, the rest obviously don‚Äôt know how to smile. This hotel is clearly the best and most comfortable in Plovdiv.
Disliked: - when they put the "clean room" button and left for 5 hours - the room was never cleaned - room service brought food half cold two out of two times - food is cooked very slowly at breakfast, instead of the planned 20 minutes they sat there for 40 - there is an order for food on the TV but no drinks

Liked: Super hotel, clean, comfortable, peaceful, friendly staff. The best part is, they let our little dog in under 10 pounds. If they bet that we can get a dog up to 10 pounds, we'll be regular customers when we're in Plovdiv. Congratulations on the design of the rooms.

It's a beautiful hotel! Very nice and professional staff. They were wearing masks, and there was an automatic disinfectant dispenser, which is very important to me under Code-19 conditions. I felt safe. .The room was spacious, clean, well-lit and warm. The bed, comfortable, provides a good, restful sleep. The presence of compliments to guests - two complimentary bottles of water, tea and coffee - also appreciated as a gesture of attention to us. WiFi - good speed. The bathroom has plenty of toiletries, as well as towels that were soft and pleasant. There's an iron and an iron in the closet, which is also a plus. I appreciate and welcome the fact that this hotel is anti-smoking and is prohibited everywhere. .I'm glad I found it, and as of today, it's in my priority hotels when I'm staying in Plovdiv. I recommend it!
Disliked: I was on a business trip, and I couldn't find a shaving kit in the bathroom (razor with a beard gel), and there was no toothpaste and toothbrush. Which for a man with limited time, would be a great plus. I hope that this will be taken into account by management and these two whales will be added. .Advice to interior designer - please set a small threshold between shower and bathroom floor, which is splashed out and not pleasant to be put on wet floor. .I recommend that we put disinfectant dispensers on the floor as well, in relation to Codeed..I didn't have time to use the gym, but I'd love to have a vertical solarium, which I'd love to visit..Except for those benevolent notes, everything else is on the level.

The hotel itself is impeccable - spacious rooms, beautifully furnished and definitely cosy.
Disliked: I had chosen a room without breakfast, and in the morning I decided to take the French breakfast with croissants. And to my surprise, they gave me three tiny little croissants, which, put together, maybe came close to the size of a normal croissant. In addition, there were 2 pieces of goat cheese, 3 thin slices of emental (or similar cheese), one sliced into 4 strawberries and 2 grapes. I'm not cheap, but when I pay ¬£15 for breakfast I expect to eat. What I got was a half-empty plate that might be enough for some lady who's got a waist, but I'm hungry! It ruined my otherwise excellent impression of the hotel itself.

Besides, we had a dinner reservation for the festive dinner on February 13th, and when we came down to the restaurant, we didn't have a reservation, the hostess tried to accommodate us in the lobby bar for dinner, and after a clear discontent from our scary restaurant, she found us a table in the restaurant... the dinner went rather heavy, we had to get our cutlery, the oil truck, the ice, the corkscrew, the corkscrew, because they left the food was open because they left us... The next day, it snowed and nobody thought to clean up, even just outside the front door. Overall 10/10 would stay here again :).

Liked: Excellent location, on the pedestrian street in the city. The room was spacious, clean and very bright with 4 windows. Nearby almost all attractions.

Liked: I was very pleased with my stay at the hotel. Very friendly and friendly staff, clean rooms, a contemporary hotel in the heart of the city. The hotel has a little detail to do with it - they left us coffee, tea, even fortune in the room, which smiled on us from the start. I'll definitely stay at the Plovdiv City Center Hotel again on my next visit! I congratulate you on your excellent attitude and professionalism in this area.

We were upgraded to an apartment overlooking the lake which was a nice surprise. The room was big with a comfortable bed....which I could fit easily at 1.91m tall. It was also a normal height as opposed to very low as in many BG hotels. Coffee making facilities...again not normal in BG hotels...were plentiful. The bathroom was very nice with piped music. We ate in the restaurant with friends and the meal was very nice, with good choice and no more expensive than in town. (We paid 60 lev inc drinks for 4 of us) Breakfast was buffet style with plenty of choice - with staff getting what you asked for from behind a screen for Covid protection. All staff wore masks properly which was good. Car parking was right next to the hotel. We didn't use the pool or spa so cannot comment on those. Will definitely stay again and recommend it all travellers...families or individuals..
Disliked: The only flaws were not taking our temps which we had been told that they would do on arrival and the restaurant tables were not separated alternately which they had been in other hotels.

Liked: Highly recommend this hotel. Visited twice in 3 months. Everything was exceptional. Located by the lake in a peaceful area, it was only a 10 minute taxi ride to the town centre. Staff were friendly and polite. What you see in the hotel photos is exactly what you get..
Disliked: I liked everything..

Liked: it was satisfactory ,the serving according to Covid regulation wasn't convenient but this is how it should be....

Location.

The room was huge, and so was the terrace..The pool was nice ... fully equipped with sun umbrellas,  chairs etc. .The food from the restaurant is mostly very good, and so is the local wine..Some staff were especially nice: the food waiter at the pool, some waiter in the restau, some staff at the reception..
Disliked: We stayed 10d in the hotel, and it was a good choice..The hotel is very nicey located, an oasis with regards to the city BUT it can only be reached by car..The socialistic origin cannot neglected. The employees were mostly nice but often helpless: the perception of service is rather formal than efficient. Most of them were though very friendly; however, we as well experienced an individually rude waiter, several times..Examples: there was a desk in the room but its chair did not fit. Nobody realized that. No change possible..Similar with a beautiful sun umbrella on the terrace - its position was inadequate to provide shadow at any time but it was too massive to be moved by two guests. Would have needed staff repositioning..The room service came every day but might remove towels without replacement, several times. We figured where to find them, and the toilet paper..The reception could help with cabs, but was unsuccessful with car rental - they were very motivated, but could not. They could not advice how to reach famous places by public transport. We solved all that, using the internet and our phones, with some effort: finally, we could get a bus connection, and a car rental that could provide a car with no problem, and even cheap..The pool service cannot provide towels, but can send us to a place to ask for them. They as well did not realize the need of repositioning sun umbrellas during the day - and did not report the need to their management, maybe to find umbrellas holders that can be moved (they are very massive)..The restaurant terrace is the preferred eating place for the guests, but not so for the waiters. There was a tendency to keep the door from the restaurant closed, especially during breakfast..After 23.00, it was impossible to get a fresh beer, a glass of wine or juice, no drink. The bar is not a bar..We did not regret our choice since the hotel provided what we needed for a relaxing stay in Plovdiv..

Liked: Clean , nice view, staff very friendly, Lyudmila Ivanova from reception she was very helpful and friendly!.
Disliked: The bread at the breakfast wasn‚Äôt fresh for the 3 days we stayed!.

Hotel is solid and has a authentic feel, amazing views with rowing canal at the doorstep, countryside around, close to plovdiv centre. we were able to book at a very short notice, staff were all kind, friendly and very helpful and the kids got a soft toy as a welcome present, which we thought was very sweet. the rooms were spacious and clean, comfortable and there was complimentary water..

Liked: The location was great and the restaurant was really good. The room was spacious and clean..

Liked: The restaurant was nice and the breakfast - delicious. The room was big - comfy bed, cozy lights..
Disliked: It is unacceptable for a 4* spa hotel to make you pay for the spa itself. Only the fitness, which was so little, cold and vintage, and the sauna are free of charge. If you want to use jacuzzi or steam bath, you should pay 20lv a day per person. Sauna and steam bath were so little and due to covid only 2 people can use it at the same time. Therefore, most of the time you can‚Äôt use the spa at all. Additionally, on the Sunday breakfast, we were unable to eat at the restaurant as it was full. There were three tables which were not cleaned but as no waiter was cleaning anything, we ate  in the room. So when a person get off the table - noone can sit again. Finally, one of the nights the wind was so strong we could‚Äôt sleep because it was so noisy despite the closed windows and doors. Maybe the reason is that the hotel is placed at the city end but for a 4* spa hotel you expect better isolation..

Due to the lockdown and the lack of opened restaurants during my whole stay at the hotel I had to order food from foodpanda, which is unacceptable..

Liked: The breakfast was absolutely amazing!  I also loved the saunas area..
Disliked: The pool was a little too crowded..

Liked: Amazing breakfast selection!!.
Disliked: It would be nice to have better vegetarian options on the menu!.

Liked: Perfect in any aspects! Keep walking.
The city ciew is just perfect.
Beautiful place , great location & nice facilities , family & child friendly .Very friendly staff.

The hotel is on a remote location with clean air and no traffic noise, yet on a short driving distance from Plovdiv. The pool and spa areas are cool and the property is big with lots of outdoor entertainment. The breakfast is stellar, by far the best I‚Äôve ever had! The staff was very friendly. Plus we were allowed to stay with our yorkie. We had a wonderful experience. Thank you!.
Disliked: The restaurant at the pool was terrible.it offered pricey fast food. We thought it was the same food as the restaurant that made breakfast but it wasn‚Äôt. Go up for a wonderful meal and please consider healthy good food for your ground level restaurant..

Liked: Nice spa with a choice of pools, very friendly staff. The breakfast was excellent. Wide yard for a walk after dinner..
Disliked: Almost no negative comment‚Ä¶ may be the bathroom can be a bit cleaner and an extra bottle of water could have been provided the second day..
.Disliked ¬†¬∑¬†View from the room.

Liked: Amenities for children,the  swimming pools, the breakfast was amazing..
Disliked: There was odd smell in the room. Bathroom was full with water after taking shower. We stayed for 2 nights, our room wasn't cleaned during our stay..

Liked: There were a lot of facilities sutiable for kids of any age. It is the perfect place for a family vacation. .The breakfast was good. .The food in the restaurant was excellent. There is menu for kids..
Disliked: The restaurant is a bit expensive. If you want to have lunch or dinner in another place, you have to drive to Plovdiv or the nearby villages. .The rooms were cleaned in the afternoon quite hours and it was little bit noisy..

Liked: The breakfast was excellent and the buffet dinner also offered large variety of food and  tasty meals. .The pools are clean  and well heated - great for the kids.Garden and playground is also great. Kids have a lot of fun there..
Disliked: The internal jacuzzi was emptied and filled during the entire day and it was not operational. This should be done during the night, especially when the most of the hotel is full. I overheard a conversation that one of the staff members proposed to be done during the night, but for my surprise the next day it was not working and it was being filled with a tiny hose (10mm max) with cold water so it really did not work the entire day....  .The overpriced restaurant where we made only 3 attempts for dinner/lunch and give up. I really wander how the same staff prepares so delicious buffet dinners and the made to order things are so tasteless. The chickens soup and pork ribs were terrible, the salads were OK.... .The pillows have some holes from overuse and should be checked.

Liked: Perfect place for families with kids. Entertainment for kids, relax for parents. Breakfast is amazing. All staffs are polite. A clean pool for everyone - from baby to adults..

The hotel is made for families with kids - our 5 year old absolutely loved it. The indoor pools are nice for children with lots of attractions. The outdoor children playground was absolutely perfect - fun, clean and located in a beautiful garden with amazing view. The breakfast was very good, included a full variety of foods and drinks, good coffee and even fresh orange juice. We have also enjoyed the restaurant a-la-cart menu for lunch and dinner. The room was renovated and the view from our terrace was great - we could watch the sunset..
Disliked: Our biggest problem was the low pressure of the water in our room. Especially knowing the price for a night we have paid... We have stayed on the 4th floor (out of 5) and we could barely take a shower. The temperature of the water was also changing all the time to extremes. It was almost impossible to wash my little girl's hair. The soundproof of the rooms is also an issue - it was very noisy all the time. The outdoor pools were a bit cold..

Liked: We are a regular guests of this hotel. The hotel had taken all precautions for the pandemic. The hotel offers great facilities for families with kids, outdoor and indoor activities, awesome spa center, great indoor and outdoor pools with hot water which was a big supprise on our first stay and one of the reasons that we come back again. Indoor and outdoor playground for kids. Spacious rooms, excellent breakfast. The service here is excellent. All the staff are extremely friendly and pleasant.Very kind and fast service,prices are very good. The hygiene is on high level everything is clean and tidy.Parking available in front of the hotel.I warmly recommend !!!.
Disliked: However, the only downside of our stay where the pillows in the room. Everything was good apart from the pillows. I am utterly shocked that they allowed this to be used in a hotel like this one. There is no way possible for this not to have been noticed before. Overall everything else besides pillows was perfect..

Liked: Perfect conditions for families. Every detail is designed for kids and parents..
Amazing place and staff.
Nice hotel with great breakfast and big SPA area. The staff was polite and really attentive..
Disliked: Definitely expected more from the restaurant. The SPA area (Infrared sauna) wasn‚Äôt very clean..

Liked: The area is well maintained, but location is not very pleasant- industrial road and some constructions..Excellent place for the families with children. Restaurant is great for dinner as well for breakfast. Staff was very friendly.
Disliked: Spa is not a spa - it‚Äôs a crazy kids center, no place to hide, noisy, disturbing, impossible to relax. Shower in the room is trying to show you all - range from ice cold to boiling hot..

Liked: Location and staff.
Disliked: The mattress and sound of the air conditioner.

Liked: We had a great stay at the hotel. We didn't miss anything. The room, although we had the cheapest one, was big enough for a family with two young children. The bed was comfortable. Everyone was really polite. The breakfast was just wonderful. The fitness was also nice and clean. It was definitely worth the money..
Wonderful swimming pools for the kids. Very nice outdoor activity place for the kids. Friendly staff in the restaurant. Nice breakfast..

Liked: Great location, very clean and comfortable rooms, clean and warm pool and spa area. Perfect for kids. Excellent breakfast..
Disliked: N/A.

Liked: The food is excellent, breakfast and dinner both of very high quality. Spa and outdoor facilities are very diverse and nice for both children and adults..

Liked: Staff friendly, good food..

Liked: Super nice staff at all units, very clean rooms and a nice spa area..
Disliked: Everything was perfect!.

Liked: Great place for families with kids. Spacious rooms, clean and comfortable. Food was good..
Excellent hotel, very nice staff, good hygene in the spa.

A great hotel at an amazing location. Lot's to do for families with children (including animation). The rooms are big and the bed's are very comfortable. The spa and the swimming-pools are very nice. If you have time, go there. If you don't have time, make time!!.
Pool and SPA were really great! Breakfast is very varied and the food is very delicious!.
Disliked: Housekeeping must be improved! 2 days nobody cleaned the room even if we aksed couple of times the housekeeping stuff..

Liked: Very family friendly ,lots to do with children inside and outside ( playgrounds, game room, movie night) ,  excellent spa area / treatment . Liked: Pool, Spa, food - excellent.
The hotel, pools, restaurants everything was excellent. The kids are really enjoying all the facilities. It is clean, warm and cosy with a lot of different activities..
Disliked: The only thing we didn‚Äôt like was that the place was crowded. Pools and restaurant were fool, which would be understandable if it wasn‚Äôt covid time....

Liked: We didn't have much time to try out the spa. The garden was very well maintained even during winter. The breakfast offered great variety of home made local products of exceptional quality. The restaurant is all-round great. Very good value for money..
Everything..

Excellent hotel with vast park with many playgrounds. The rooms were really big and modern, beds comfy and WiFi strong signal. We had half board and the food was excellent. Even fresh orange juice for breakfast and some vegan products. The only negative thing was the lack of water for dinner. The guests will still order something to drink from the restaurant, but normally there is at least plain water or some herbal teas for the dining guest. The spa is also quite nice, though the pools were a bit cooler for us..
Disliked: Well, the location is not that exciting. But I guess they can`t build such a huge and generous complex at other place..

Liked: Everything was perfect. I was very impressed by the hand written Christmas card that we found in our room from the hotel management..
Disliked: The first day when we arrived, the water in the pools was warmer. This is not a big issue as it was still warm..

Liked: pool was fabulous.. area around hotel was superb. Perfect for families . Kids were kept busy during stay. Excellent spa. Very friendly staff..

Only stayed for one night but would definitely return. Room was much larger than expected. Breakfast the next morning was delicious. Reception and  room service staff also were very friendly and helpful, nothing was too much to ask.

Everything was perfect during our stay. Great value for money. I would give 5 start to this hotel as it overachiever for most of 5 stars in Bulgaria. Everything was working and was well maintained. In one of our rooms the air conditioner was not working and the repair man fixed it quickly. The breakfast is great with full variety of quality products. The restaurant was great too, since we were there during the pandemic we mostly ordered to our room and every time the food was great and was delivered within reasonable time although most of the rooms ordering at the same time. It is a bit expensive compared to local restaurants but good value for money..A lot of outdoor activities for children ansd specious place for walks. Excellent Spa facilities with indoor pool currently  being expanded which will make it even better. Definitely recommended for families with children..
Disliked: There was nothing that I didn't like but a few things for improvement. The size of outdoor pool is small compared to the hotel capacity. Same for gaming room..

Liked: Great location, really pleasant and clean rooms, but the thing that makes this such a good place to stay are the staff. All of the people are incredibly helpful and generous with their time and advice..
Disliked: N/A..

Liked: Everything else was great, the food, location, hotel park. It was very nice..
Disliked: I was able to participate in my neighbour's conversation. The walls are very thin..

Liked: Comfortable and spacious room and bathroom..Access to SPA center included in the price..

Breakfast is superb, healthy choices also and baby food. The room is big enough, beds are very confortable. Very nice spa center and very big chooses of massages are offered. We had two dinners at the restaurant, everything was very tasty. Highly recommended..

Amazing huge spa with many kinds of saunas and hamam, you can book massage and other treatments. Big inside warm pool and also outside pool. The breakfast was good with a lot of choices. They keep the COVID 19 rules. The room is big and with nice Mountain View. Wifi was good. We will come back to this hotel when we back in Plovdiv area. Thanks üôè.
Disliked: The location it‚Äôs outside Plovdiv in place call makrovo if you have car it‚Äôs best hotel you can find but without a car u will need taxi and about 15-20min drive to get to Plovdiv city.

Liked: It was so nice that I wanted to come back again and again..The only one minus is the fact that housekeeping never came to clean our room so we had to use wet towels, having two children that was a nightmare. .Food, location, service, room service, staff, restaurant, overall hygiene, amenities, SPA... everything was 5 stars. Recommend the hotel to every family who wants to just enjoy their holiday without anything to bother you....Currently I‚Äôm in another hotel for a short break and I‚Äôm literally only thinking I‚Äôve made a big mistake choosing this place over Markovo :// wish to see you guys very soon again!.Never booking any other place in Bulgaria.
Disliked: Housekeeping didn‚Äôt clean the room..No drying racks or any racks at all.

Liked: A really fantastic place especially for family with kids. We even canceled our stay in Sofia to spend more time in the Markovo hotel. They have excellent playground and child club. The spa zone is beautiful and awesome, the food is very delicious and the rooms very comfortable with really good beds. Highly recommended!.
Nice kids attractions.
Disliked: The biggest issue for me was the lack of hot water at peak times..

Liked: Spa facilities,Restaurant..
Wonderful place with delicious food!.
Excellent!.
Disliked: Nothing.

Liked: Good location, nice views over the city and surroundings. Clean, friendly staff, rich breakfast. Nice pool indoor/outdoor, very modern playground. Great place for families.

Liked: The hotel area is huge and well maintained. It's very clean and fresh. The rooms are large and well designed. The staff is welcoming and helpful at all times. The spa is great and very clean. The food is amazing and the restaurant is not very expensive for a hotel. Basically they have everything you might need. Also, you are very close to Plovdiv if you are in for a walk around. .P.S Marko is the friendliest donkey you'll ever meet. The ducks are the cutest ducks you'll see..

The Breakfast was amazing. It was so much variety, we even had a chocolate fountain. Besides this all the products were good quality. I really enjoyed it. The rooms were big and warm. The restaurant was good to. I would come back with pleasure next time, maybe in holiday..
Disliked: I could not control the temperature in my room so it was a little too hot at night. The toiled didn't flush all the toiled paper. But this are minor inconveniences. These did not effect negative my stay..

Liked: Rooms 8/10.Exceptional clean room. Absolutely every part of it was sparkling. Bedding- crispy white. No dirt around all those tiny little spaces..All you need for a comfort stay provided..The minibar has snacks/ soft drinks and some little alcohol bottles. As a nice touch up there is a drawer with extra stuff you may need, like socks, razors or some very yummy snacks..We would give 10 if someone actually came to clean up our room or at least give us some dry towels for a stay of 5 days!.Recommendations:.It will be nice to have some drying racks in the bathrooms. As a family hotel it would be helpful as children and babies always make stains on their clothes. Or for example after using your towel you would like to hang it somewhere to dry. There are only two hooks which really don‚Äôt help at all. We had to dry our bath robes over the doors which is very ugly. And of course they never dry properly so you must ask for new ones every single day!.Breakfast 10/10.The restaurant is beautiful,.Spacious, clean, very well maintained and organised. Even though there are only few team members serving the breakfast every looks smooth and clean..The food has a great variety..Some stuff are exceptional like: homemade jams - strawberries, blueberries and apples ones made in their own kitchen..Very tasty sandwiches with ham and cheese..And something I‚Äôve never ever seen since I‚Äôm travelling- Baby food in jars. There is a variety of organic baby pur√©e. For a mom with two little babies this means life!It is amazing as we forgot our ones at home and had to head out to grab some but that surprise left me with mouth opened. I really hope that the person who gave this idea to be providing baby pur√©e for breakfast will read this as feel absolutely proud of himself!!!.Also you can make yourself freshly squeezed orange juice!.Room Service 10/10.The restaurant team is amazing as well..All the time food was coming extremely tasty..
Disliked: Our room never got cleaned for a stay of 5 nights. On the first day we said we don‚Äôt need a room clean just we need few new towels and no one came to clean the room ever since. .The last two nights we had to dry ourselves with absolutely wet towels as there are no drying racks in the bathroom and you don‚Äôt have where to hang them to dry..

Liked: Everything is good, pool, sauna, staff.Excellent breakfast.
Disliked: Air conditioner wasn‚Äôt working..I stayed I the hotel in October and air conditioner was working on winter mode..And was 25 degrees inside the room..I needed to sleep with balcony open following the staff advice.

Liked: Everything was great, the staff very flexible and open-minded, diversified breakfast , the pool and spa center very fine..
My husband and I enjoyed the spa. They have plenty of unique service options, they were very kind and accommodating and affordable. Breakfast was delicious and the room was amazing..
Disliked: The elevator wasn‚Äôt working and it‚Äôs a bit warm in the hallways..

Liked: Amazing place and service , really recommend ! Best value for money for will ever get in Bulgaria..
Disliked: Nothing..

.Disliked ¬†¬∑¬†The red bathrooms and rooms. You feel like you have been part of a massacre, and it makes you feel depressed. .Applicable for the red rooms design. The blue one is OK..

Liked: Great spa, excellent food, a lot of entertainment for kids, big and clean rooms, lovely park..

Liked: Nice pool, nice clean rooms (only these after refurbishment!).

Liked: It is a hotel that deserves 5 stars.has nothing to dislike in this hotel has a beautiful view, friendly and trained staff, relaxation area, cleanliness.
Excellent facilities - the outside pool and chairs, the wonderful park and playground - we had a lot of fun! The restaurant (The View) was very nice too, very good attitude to us and our pet!.

The room is very large and very clean. The air conditioning is very efficient. The restaurant has a wide variety of well-cooked products..The rules related to Coronavirus in the restaurant are respected by all staff..

Liked: Outside swimming pool super clean. Life guard all day long. Nice people around, as well behaved..
Disliked: Very lovely hotel. Helpful staff, nice calm atmosphere..

Liked: It was very clean and comfortable. The double room was suitable even for a family with two children. Clean and big outdoor pool. The breakfast was exceptional with variety that can rarely be seen..

Liked: Very good breakfast with fresh orange juice..We order Deluxe Room which is really worthy for additional 10 EUR..

Liked: The pool was very nice. There was also a big garden to have a night walk in..The first day we had a weird noise in our room and they upgraded our room for free. This was nice..
Disliked: Nothing..

Liked: Spacious, clean, excellent facilities..
Disliked: Nothing.

Liked: Staying at the hotel for 2 nights,6 persons, we really enjoyed the pool, the new playground for the kids and the breakfast, See you soon again Markovo Hotel....
Disliked: Everything is perfect!!!!.

Liked: Very nice hotel, the pool is great. The rooms are spacious and were cleaned every day. Friendly staff. The food was good. Great location near Plovdiv.
Awesome breakfast, cleanliness, swimming polls. Also For Children rope attractions, playground area inside and outside..

Very nice hotel, perfect for families with kids. Big and clean room with an awesome view for Plovdiv hills, very nice spa facilities and pools which are perfect for kids, both the inside and outside pools. The staff was very kind and responsive to all needs. The hotel has a very nice yard with a donkey and a pool with ducks and our kid really enjoyed them. There are also kids playgrounds - one for smaller kids and one for bigger ones, there is also kids room inside and games for the bigger kids. The breakfast had very very big variety and was very delicious. In all it was a perfect weekend stay and we will gladly come back again!.

Liked: Everything was absolutely amazing. Spa area did not work but they compensated everything with other offers and kindness. The whole area was fantastic. We also used restaurant services and the food was excellent..

Liked: The hotel is great. We booked a deluxe room, which was a great size. Pool and all spa facilities are great. We had breakfast and dinner at the hotel and we enjoyed the food as well..

Liked: The breakfast was excellent . Nice and clean room..

Disliked: No major setbacks; it was overall a pleasant experience.

Liked: great family hotel.

Liked: It is very clean, amazing SPA with hot water and salt room. Rooms are clean and big. The food was also fantastic!.

Liked: We loved the heated pools, they were especially great!.The kids club was nice and the "arcade" area didn't offer much but was still good..The hotel looks new, the room was spacey and comfortable (we took the deluxe room)..

Liked: The hotel is exquisite and definitely provides great value at a decent price. Everything one needs for a good, relaxing vacation is on sight, including a spa, gym, swimming pool, supervised kids play area and splendid evening dining and breakfast buffet. Staff are pleasant to deal with and most are highly proficient when communicating in English. The modern aesthetic designs and finishes in the rooms are very classy and the beds are very comfortable. The swimming pools are perfectly heated and suitable for small children and adults alike. The views from the delux apartments overlook the city of Plovdiv and are beautiful at night. The price for buffet dinner was incredibly reasonable for the spread that was on offer. Well worth the 50BGN for two adults and a kid..
Disliked: Getting to the hotel, you have to drive through some not so good looking areas and roads. However, once you are in the hotel, you easily forget about the road trip. The carpet in our room (429) seemed a bit musty and probably could do with some intense deep cleaning..

Liked: Personnel was really kind everywhere. The hotel has excellent facilities for kids and there are details at any place within the hotel area, that are focused to families (enough children chairs in the restaurant, healthy food, kid zone and so on)..
The hotel offers a big parking and the spa is excellent..

Well, this was our second stay in this hotel within a month and we  have never done this for a property in Bulgaria :).All is very good - the SPA center, the attractions for kids, the food is very very good, the staff is very nice..Really enjoyed our stay and will come back again for sure..
Disliked: During weekends and holidays season, can be quite noisy, e.g. the soundproofing of the rooms can be better..Not enough water pressure in the ensuite bathroom - hard to take a shower, sometimes you feel like it will stop....

Liked: Location is great, very close to Plovdiv..The Staff at Reception, Lobby Bar, SPA Center, Kids Center was friendly, polite and helpful..The waitresses at the restaurant not so much though....The food at the restaurant for dinner was quite good, .for Breakfast  - Exceptionally Good - A lot of things to chose from..The SPA center is very good and clean..A very good hotel, I recommend, .kids friendly - they have own amusement center and very big playground outside.
Disliked: The construction works they conduct, can be a bit noisy, especially the music from the workers outside :).There was not enough water pressure in the bathroom, hard to take a shower..

Liked: I am very happy to say that,hotel is really great,the staff is very friendly the food was great the breakfast all you can imagine....the spa- just perfect.
It was clean,really spacious and comfortable.The staff was friendly and the food in the restaurant was awesome.I really enjoyed there were a plant based milk products üôà.
The room, the location, the staff, the massage, the check-out hour..
Disliked: Breakfast starting way too late, 7:30; loud and inappropriate music. Very kitschy lobby (while the rooms are fine) and overall off-putting architecture..

Liked: Big rooms, nice spa. Big parking..
Disliked: Fresh scrambled eggs and yogurt would be nice. Quite distance from city center..

Liked: *Breakfast is fine, not only EU style, various food included in breakfast.*SPA area is clean and comfortable. I really like warm swimming pools (32 degree)..*Rooms are big enough and new furniture as well...
Disliked: * Far away city center, 15 min. away by car..* SPA center closes at 21.00 pm. It should be more than 21.00 pm ( for examp: 22.30 or 23.00 PM) because many people maybe arrive after 8 o'clock to Hotel. For this reason, To rest well, it should be closed later on..

Liked: Super friendly and kind staff. Breakfist is super rich. Spa is great!  Excellent conditions for kids with a big kids area and salt room!.
Disliked: A bit cold in the room. The temperature was set at 24 degrees when outside is 5 degrees.  Bath towels couldn't dry from one day till the other but when we asked housekeepers to change them, problem was solved..

I imagine it would be very nice as a wedding venue,.

Disliked: Everything was fine.It is just sometimes electricity had interruptions instantly,but all accomodation and services were perfect.We will visit again soon.Well done..

Liked: The room that we took was a big one for 2 adults and two kids. We, the adults used the   Sofa and it was very not comfortable... the room is very clean and equipped and the staff is helpful. The spa is nice..

Liked: Very luxurious and cheap at the same time.The spa is great..The beds are super comfort.

Great place with spacious rooms. Nice facilities. And the staff is great as well..

Liked: Excellent hotel,disagn ,nice colors rooms and hotel,excellent service,spa and kids area..Breakfast was very good ..

Liked: Very nice hotel with amazing view of Plovdiv. Its 25 minutest away from the city center by car. Very clean. The staff is young but professional. The indoor pools are amazing. Very good playground with lots of toy for the little ones, it has outdoor and indoor parts..

Very comfortable, clean, bright and quite room, we travelled  with kids and was very important to feel like home! Had everything we needed and will definitely recommend it.!!.
Everything especially Location, facilities, and views..
Lovely place.Great facilities.Good breakfast.Great location.

The room and the bathroom were very big. The bed was huge and very confortable. The room was clean (including the carpet on the floor). To make it clear, we were at the main restaurant, not at the pool area. The hair I found was short so I couldn't judge weather it was male or female piece of hair but it was truly disgusting. Liked: Polite and polite staff (valet, waiter/bartender). The hotel rooms and general areas were well cleaned. The food included in the breakfast was quality and varied.

Liked: food buffet.Wishful thinking

Liked: Very nice garden, well-kept and tidy; Kids' facilities/climbing equipment, as well as animators are great. The pools are pleasant and sufficient if used only by hotel guests. Dogs are allowed; a quiet place, far from the city.
Disliked: Details that ruin otherwise positive impressions - like, at Mount Gergjovden, at 11:00 in the morning, two balconies below us are cut with a corner light, plaster walls with a hammer are smashed, garments are turned. The reception bell goes, "Oh, yeah? There shouldn't be any repairs now?" 10 minutes and not answering; At least 30 minutes later, the corner line stops, but the work goes on, quietly, with just curses and beer. Staff follow the rules - commendable, guests only voluntarily (not in the restaurant, everything is strict there). Nice park, sun loungers at the pool, 10-metre "road" of construction waste; behind the building and the garden - construction site, bagels and sand, fun. Parking for 200+ cars, one wheelchair - arriving, proudly parked the lawn chair in the garden, for 3 hours (I didn't check if there was a blue ticket, if there was - sorry, unnecessary nagging). And the little things that are put together remain a slightly bitter taste of an otherwise beautiful place.

Liked: Location in itself is good, fine restaurant, very good breakfast.

Liked: Breakfast was unique." Five stars!

In fact, the hotel was also a major construction site, there was extensive construction work going on outside and renovation work in the hotel, e.g. there were plasterboard panels in the stairwell including leakage material to protect the stairs.....2. The breakfast buffet offered was good, but lacked plates, bowls, cutlery... The drinks machines (coffee and juice) needed a constant repair of the completely overworked staff, as the number of staff was not balanced in relation to the number of guests. The non-smoking area was admittedly only a third occupied by guests, but all the free tables were occupied with used dishes, so that only the smoking area for breakfast was left...The cleanliness throughout the food area was poor!..3. Room service did not take place all day when we arrived back to the hotel room on 27/07/17 from our trip, was asked if cleaning was possible now?!..4. The bar counter was half delivered in the evening with dirty glasses and dishes, the only barman was completely overwhelmed, but very friendly!..Conclusion: A nice hotel area, but which urgently needs organization, more staff and a renovation. A hotel being renovated and remodeled is completely normal, but why this information is not disclosed at the time of booking and why this has to happen during peak season remains the secret of hotel management.

Liked: Great breakfast and helpful staff.
Disliked: The spa, it was pretty Zenemar.
The hotel is under renovation, full of flies and mosquitoes. We left ahead of time. The air conditioning barely works.

Liked: Comfortable room..Beautiful environment. .Nice spaces.
Disliked: It's the first time I've ever had a 4-star hotel not cleaning the room. We didn't have towels to bathe on our way back late in the afternoon. The staff was indifferent.

Liked: Nice view of Plovdiv. The apartments are well-appointed and have a pleasant, cosy atmosphere. The staff is very polite and friendly.
Disliked: They don't have a beer opener in the room, but there are loaded little brides of beer in the minibar. I waited an hour for them to bring me the rest of the stuff from the minibar. The bellhop didn't take my suitcase when I got here. Dirty toilets on the first floor. Because I made a remark about these things, they won't let me in their hotel anymore. I had paid for a room in booking. For two hours, they wouldn't give me a room or the money or offer me another hotel. The hotel manager hid and I had to call the police. It's a very unpleasant experience and...

On arrival, contrary to what was stated, the spa was under construction and the outdoor pool was empty..Unfriendly and poorly qualified staff.  Almost only speaks Bulgarian..Despite 145 TV channels, no French channel-After booking, information of a 25% discount due to the lack of pool and spa. When paying at the front desk they don't want to apply the discount anymore.

Liked: The spa is very good and the food in the restaurant is excellent. The view from the room is beautiful, on the mountains.
Disliked: Staff attitude. For a 4 star hotel, this attitude is not acceptable. The maids do not understand elementary words in either English or Russian. Only in Bulgarian. I had to use a translator. The maid was in ordinary clothes, not work clothes. Our room was never cleared. To use the iron, for some reason you need to go down to the reception and take it yourself, but the board is already being brought to the room. Why you can't bring everything together is a mystery. A similar situation with a set of towels. If you don‚Äôt get it, go to the reception for them yourself. The spa also gave out towels with difficulty. Despite the fact that they are, for some reason it was necessary to take from the room.

Liked: Very suitable for families with children. Breakfast was very varied and delicious. I like that there's a children's playground with an animator, a playground and nice room service.
Disliked: The air conditioning is central and we couldn't adjust the degrees. We had specifically asked if the room was warm enough, since we were with a baby five months old. We had to use a blowtorch.

Liked: Great family stay, friendly staff, excellent equipment, happy to come back.
Amazing pool, well heated with a very friendly spa area. Outdoor Jacuzzi. fabulous. Very comfortable room.
Disliked: Restaurant staff unfriendly

Liked: Very good conditions for children
Food and presentation and fast service.
Disliked: There were a lot of young families with young children, which is no problem, of course, but from a hygienic point of view, getting into the pool with diapers is not very acceptable...

Liked: The girl in the nursery! So responsible, so sweet, so good with the kids!
Great hotel, wide and comfortable rooms, a smiling staff with very positive child care.
Everything was great for value... we'll be back.
Disliked: The window in the room doesn't close and there was traffic coming from the street...

Liked: Nice jacuzzi with hot water outside. Great restaurant, delicious breakfasts.
Disliked: Everything was great. There are many children, but this is logical, because the hotel is family-run.

Liked: Everything else was very good. The room was clean when we checked in. The water on the baseketball was very nice, about 30 degrees. The children's show was great. The park is also very nice and it's great for children. Breakfast, delicious and varied. Dinner was free and everything we ordered was delicious. We'd like to visit again if we could solve the bug problem..It was my birthday and they surprised me with a box of candy and a card üòä
Disliked: The bugs in the room we saw the second night. They were the size of an ant, and we killed at least 20 of them..We had lunch one day at the lobby bar, waited for about 50 feet of club sandwiches, and then the cold came.

Liked: Everything
Disliked: The cleanliness of the rooms.

Liked: Everything was on the level: service, food, cleanliness, spa, children's playground, animation, staff were always smiling and courteous. The restaurant menu was delicious, but everything was delicious. Breakfast was plentiful and fully matched the photos on the site. We're definitely going to visit the hotel again!
The pools, the room, breakfast - all very well.
Disliked: It's a little more expensive than I expected.

Liked: Daily housekeeping;.Towels and bathrobes were changed daily;.The maid's attitude is commendable, kind and helpful;.The children's corner was available;
Disliked: The staff cleaned the room every day, which is commendable, but the room itself was like a stale, wallpaper I mean, which made me a little sad, it just stood out against the background of the prices I had, but maybe my expectations were higher!

Liked: Everything else
Disliked: The extra bed was terrible.

Liked: We loved it all.
All
Disliked: Unique

Liked: The sleep was good with everything you needed, and breakfast was good.
Disliked: The room wasn't cleaned properly and hasn't been renovated in a while.

Liked: Clean, courteous staff, high level spa
I liked everything about your hotel, the only thing I noticed was that there was no water dispenser in the hotel.
Perfect hotel for families with young children. You're really gonna get some rest.

We had a very pleasant relaxing break with the kids. It is a great place for families with children. The press was very cooperative and positive, the food was varied and quality, and the cleanliness was on the level. Thank you for everything, and we'll be back!

The complex is great for kids. There is plenty of play area, and the pools are adapted. The spa area is varied - there are several different saunas, a steam bath and more..The restaurant is great for breakfast and dinner!.The staff was good.
Disliked: Some small things made me feel bad:.- we asked for early check-in (about 2 hours earlier than announced) - they asked for ¬£10. per hour. I think that is unacceptable and for the first time I see it as politics. That way they lost us as lunch customers!.- when they made a payment mistake, I don't think it was intentional, but it's good that the front desk staff pay more attention..- It would be nice if there was an adult pool... a very small part is left for adults and is again extremely shallow - 1:30.

Liked: Hearty breakfast, great conditions and spa treatments
A suitable place for parents with children.
Disliked: Please note that the air conditioning system is not adjustable on its own.

Liked: The staff's experience to help honestly and goodwill to improve the service and fix the problems. Excellent breakfast. Fine coffee .. Cork
Disliked: A very nice hotel with a lot of small defects and immediately annoying electric kettle without a suitable connection point, the water flow is very weak, the sink stopper does not close, the ramp for the disabled is steep to the point of danger, a step down to a friend pool and more ....

Liked: We had a wonderful time. The staff was very friendly and helpful, the rooms are clean and the view from the terrace is spectacular. It's a great place to relax.
Almost everything.
Disliked: The only umbrella by the pool was the cheap ones-- some broken, few of them, easily falling off the wind. ..The porch railing wasn't smeared.

Liked: We found him easy, it was clean. The entire staff was extremely kind and friendly.

The complex is beautiful and has potential..The staff was behaving beautifully! Thank you for your professionalism!.The food was delicious. Only, at breakfast I missed the beautiful, Bulgarian herbal teas.Suitable for families with children!.There is a lovely green area and a lovely entertainment for the children..One of the best things about me was the view from the room at night.
Disliked: 1) The sofa bed for a child to sleep on was too hard to sleep on - it would be good to put a mattress/mattress on top! The bedroom wasn't small, but with a three-year-old on the same bed, the sleeping is a mirage...  If we'd known beforehand, we'd have booked a room with three beds..2) There was a swallow nest on the terrace and, accordingly, the nest deck was "mined" and it was risky to sit on this side...     The nests must not be destroyed! Eventually, something could be placed under the nest to protect the person sitting under it - options are many - the simplest of which is the beach umbrella, the "Gleason"

Liked: Staff attitude, restaurant, breakfast, spa and room.
Disliked: A view of the gas cylinders and the gravel road instead of the mountain.The lack of wine glasses in the room.

Liked: I like everything.
Disliked: Everything was on the level.

Liked: Breakfast was good.
Disliked: They let outside visitors into the spa, although the hotel is full of hotel facilities.

Liked: We loved the pool and especially the salt room at the spa, and we went to the restaurant for breakfast, which was very good.
Disliked: The heating in the room was low, we couldn't raise the temperature, and the maids were a little noisy, no good soundproofing and we couldn't get a full rest.

Liked: Good location, good facilities, good facilities.
Disliked: Room and bathroom

Liked: The whole structure should be evaluated positively. The strengths are certainly the excellent breakfast, the Spa with indoor pool (although there was a small misunderstanding with the Spa girl about the possibility of changing in the changing room and not necessarily having to go down from the room in a bathrobe) and, overall, the value for money..Obviously, being a bit far from the city center, I think it is necessary to have a rental car..Definitely recommend.
Disliked: Nothing All good overall.

Liked: The comfortable room, that even the standard room was quite luxurious and completely renovated, the spotless swimming pools and the nice breakfast.
Disliked: The only negative is the 15-minute drive from the city.

Liked: The beautiful view of Plovdiv, the spacious room and bathroom, the comfortable bed, the availability of towels, the hot and clean water in the pools, the clean sauna and the steam bath. Especially the smiling, well-mannered employees! I must also note the varied and delicious breakfast as well as the delicious dishes in the restaurant.
Disliked: The lack of several information and advertising signs on the way to the hotel after the detour from the Thrace motorway. Navigation has not been sufficient to easily discover the hotel. The construction around the outdoor pool could be appropriately hidden so as not to spoil the otherwise wonderful view of the hotel's park.

Liked: All liked it
Disliked: All liked it

Liked: His breakfast is fine, spa facilities are excellent. Rooms are spacious and beds are very comfortable. It's a very comfortable facility for families with children.
It was all very clean and luxurious. The staff is kind and attentive.
Disliked: The restaurant on the second floor has disappointed us. The meat was tough, it couldn't be cut, and the salad was cut too thick, we had to cut it ourselves. Prices are also too high for hotel guests.

Liked: The restaurant offers great views of Plovdiv and the food is superb. Breakfast is the richest breakfast I've ever had the pleasure of consuming. The staff's attitude is extremely professional - smiling, friendly, polite and respectful. There is also a comfortable children's area with many toys and well-organized space.
Disliked: The shower in the bathroom was broken, and it would be good to change soon, so... water is leaking from the earpiece entrance. The wet in the room needs a deeper cleaning (dust, not dirty).

Liked: A very good choice for a relaxing weekend! Large, comfortable rooms, very good breakfast, very good spa services and very helpful staff!
Location quiet and outside the city. Beautiful facility
Disliked: The cleaners did not overwork in the room and especially in the bathroom

Liked: The service is fantastic!!! Great all the amenities!! Price-for-pay relationship is fair!
Nice resort hotel
Rich breakfast. Large and comfortable pool. Despite the renovation the place looks quiet.
Good breakfast, clean and comfortable room. Friendly staff.
Disliked: The spa needs better maintenance. The pool is nice, but open to the public, which makes it crowded on weekends.

Liked: The hotel is very nice - the room was clean and spacious, the bathroom was nice and big, the outdoor pool is great, there is a place to walk, the restaurant is great and with a good kitchen..Staff are friendly and helpful. For example, when the restaurant was about to close, I still couldn't get down to eat the dinner that was waiting for me because our baby was so nervous. Turns out the restaurant couldn't put my food in a box, but the sitter offered to take it to my wheelchair room. .Admiration for having wheelchair ramps everywhere, even in places with only two or three steps..Breakfast was great. There was food and drink for everyone, and the products were really good. Just for example, sheep and buffalo cheese, emental, 5-6 types of olives, fresh fruit (not bad stems), good sausages, fruits and vegetables, and more..We'd visit this place again.{\*
Disliked: There are an awful lot of mosquitoes out there at night. I don't know if they're spraying or if the mosquitoes are just too horny. Maybe that explains the lack of an outside restaurant. .For our one-day stay several times, one elevator (one, the other) was not working..There was a water heater in the room, whose cable was exposed and could be dangerous..I ordered a burger from the lobby bar, which I had to wait 15 minutes to get completely cold along with cold old fries..I made a request on the reservation for a baby cot, which they e-mailed and telephoned to provide. The front desk said our room had a baby cot, but when we got in, it didn't have one. To be precise, I must point out that we did not notify reception of the pass because we arrived later than planned and we did not want to waste time in vain, but I believe that if we had reported the misunderstanding, it would have been removed because the staff was very kind. I refer to it as a flaw because there seems to be no good coordination between some of the staff.

Liked: The waiters were on the level of the kitchen. The girl at the front desk was friendly and friendly too.The garden is also very nice and well maintained, but I can't say the same for the room.
Disliked: I didn't like the way the manager was acting or whatever it is in the restaurant. Arrogant and sour.The room was clean but the sheets were torn and the wall wallpaper was torn.

Liked: Nothing.
Disliked: all clogged channels problems with the water from the shower

Liked: Huge area with a view of Plovdiv. Very nice and maintained garden, there is a small lake with swans, tennis and football fields, games for children, pool. Nice spa. Spacious rooms with large windows (we had a round window, very nice). Delicious breakfast, lynches, homemade jams, squeezed orange juice on the spot. Beautiful and large dining room. Stunning views ...
Disliked: 3 bulbs did not work. There was a blockage in the shower and sink. We asked to fix a few times. We fixed after two days. Hardly cleaned in the rooms. Just arranged finds. Once replaced. Uncluttered breakfast Unpalatable dinner. Old hotel, feel it in the rooms, in a very dark bath

Liked: Good location, good breakfast
Disliked: The rooms smell like mold, the elevators are terrible-- they get stuck and they don't work, and the stuff left in the room, after the room is vacated-- they disappear, and the staff have no explanation for it!

Liked: The possibilities are good.
Disliked: We couldn't stay because of the smell. Their rooms stink. We paid for it, but we ran half an hour later.

Liked: The restaurant and the food.
Disliked: A small indoor pool. There is only 1 jacuzzi in the entire hotel.

Liked: Excellent location. Great spa..Nice countryside
Disliked: The service of a waitress. He tried to fix his mistake.

Liked: Appreciate breakfast.  Good food and evening prices at the restaurant, great service. Also the girl who gave us massages, a terrible professional!
Disliked: It wasn't often the maids came by. The smell. The donkey that they've got has us in a headache! The indoor pool had a stuffy atmosphere, incredible humidity and no ventilation. In the outdoor pool there were no showers and there were many bees.  Also, the burger we had at the pool had a burger ready!

Liked: Location of the hotel, pool, rooms were large and it was pleasantly quiet, breakfast was good
Disliked: Service of the staff at breakfast, it was not cleared or refilled, the rooms were not made or only on request, that the bathroom was not cleaned at 4pm

Breakfast is proper quality, even though it is continental type (preselection of food is separately served). Only drinks, salat and pastries on self-service. I presume there ware only a few guests, therefore it makes sense to do it that way. No need to waste food. Personnel is polite, friendly and helpful..
Disliked: When we went into the room, we were hit by a massive heat wave. It was 32 degrees hot (outside temperature was around 15 degrees)! We turned on the cooling, open the window and went out. It was ok when we came back in the late evening. In the night I did not want to leave the ventilation working, since you could feel the cool wind blowing on your skin. Even the lowest level was rather aggressive. It is not nice to sleep on air conditioning, as the air dries as well. I opened the window, as it was around 10 degrees outside. We did not sleep well and when we woke up, it was again 31 degrees inside. Crazy hot. We informed the reception and they said it was because of the southern positioning of the room. I think it is nonsense with the cool weather we had. Can't imagine how it would be in the summertime. During breakfast, they went and turned the air conditioning on (which we have already done), so no solution for the night sleep. .I also disliked the pillows, which were extremely bulky and high. Maybe they have other ones on request, but I did not feel like requesting at midnight and waiting for them to arrive, before going to bed. I experienced these high pillows in other Best Western hotels in Bulgaria. It seems like they consider them ok since nothing changes. No issues of this kind when visiting Best Western abroad. .Outside parking has like 6 spots, which was enough in our case. Do not know whether there is an underground parking lot. If not, parking will become challenging. .I would wait a few years before visiting again and check the improvement as I believe I can have a more comfortable stay in the same price range elsewhere in Plovdiv..

The room was clean, the mattress and pillows were very comfortable. I had the perfect dream. A big plus for us busy people with jobs are both sets - toothpaste and toothbrush, and shaving, which I took advantage of. The WiFi was stable and allowed me to receive and send the necessary correspondence. The TV was of good quality, but some of the channels were down. The room was well lit and comfortably heated.
Disliked: I was placed in room 501, which has a strange funnidine (trapezius) shape, with a column in the middle, which caused me great discomfort. I shared it with reception and on my next visit, I received a promise that I would be accommodated in a rectangular or square room, which I would request in advance when booking. I came across a room like this, which was for people who didn't have breakfast at the sleepover. I think that such a 'penal' policy is stressful for guests to rest. .When I arrived, and I parked outside, I asked how I could leave my car in the hotel's underground parking lot, which I received an answer to, at the moment, they had no information as to whether there were any seats available downstairs and therefore they were sitting outside. I was very tired after a lot of engagements, and I didn't have the strength to insist on parking. From the backyard, I carried a suitcase and backpack halfway across the street to get them into the hotel room, and I could have just moved, made it easy and parked like a guest in the garage. I don't know who has the number of places in the garage in question, but it is appropriate to have this information available at check-in..I shared the above two things, i.e. I'm a platinum member of the loyal program and knowing the politics of the chain, I was a little surprised at the conditions in Plovdiv. .Besides, the shower drain wouldn't flush, so I was worried about flooding the bathroom..The room description said I'd have a coffee maker, and there wasn't one. There was a hot water jug with a non-coffee two small packets..These brief remarks are beneficial, and I hope that the branch management for Bulgaria will remedy the minor irregularities in order to continue the offer of BW's quality service.

The hotel is located near a gas station and our windows actually overlooked the gas station, so the view from the room was not very good. The biggest problem is hot water pressure. In our room 304, there was no pressure and the water was barely flowing, which made it extremely difficult to take a shower. At the same time, the pressure of hot and cold water in the sink was normal. I think the problem is with the plumbing.

Nearby there are a huge number of restaurants and cafes, a grocery supermarket. An area with a very lively nightlife, but the apartment is absolutely quiet, even with the windows open. The hostess is always in touch, she recommended a lot of interesting places both in Plovdiv and in the surrounding area. And how many places for breakfast, lunch and dinner Vessy suggested to us! Now, if to Plovdiv, then only here. Thank you so much Vessy!
The apartment is very well located, quiet and clean..The owner is considerate..Perfect. Nothing to say!

The apartment is located in the central part of Plovdiv, etc. Trap, a step away from the bars and shops. The building and the apartment are new and quite luxurious. The exhibition provides a cool and quiet environment. The furnishings are all necessary for a comfortable stay. The kitchen is well equipped with kitchenware and equipment. The purity is very high. It's very valuable to have a garage on the property, because in this part of town parking is a problem. The host's attitude was very good, too.
Disliked: I have no objections.

Liked: The best Apartment in 20 years in Bulgaria. Very modern and fully furnished, large terrace, really clean, with own lockable underground car park. Ideal location on the old town, lots of trendy cafes and restaurants right outside the front door. The hostess is very friendly and helpful. We would love to come back.

The charming, competent hostess, available, great for organizing our stay and our excursions, a big bravo and thank you to her, we do not speak Bulgarian and she always misdirected us .The apartment is excellent, one of the best we have ever had, if not the best .Spacious, bright, well designed, having everything you need and even more g An exceptional address that we recommend to all travelers -Again THANK YOU to Veselina
Disliked: Nothing, everything is perfect

Liked: Everything was perfect!

Everything was perfect! The apartment is very nice and well equipped. Especially Vessy is very friendly and special problems. The next time I'm traveling to Plovdiv for sure I'm going to stay there!.Everything was perfect! The Apartment is very spacious and equipped with everything. Especially Vessy, the hostess, is very nice and incredibly helpful. The next time I am traveling to Plovdiv, I will certainly stay in this Apartment again!
Disliked: Nothing!

Liked: P E R F E K T  ! ! !.Right in the center, yet quiet..Unusually well equipped, dish soap, .Cleaning sponges, sugar salt coffee cutlery crockery.detergent anyway, even cheese grater, lemon press, .cotton buds are available..House / Apartment is new, furnishings too..The hosts? The street is quiet, it's not in the city centre. We were in a car and bicycles and we took advantage of the underground garage. The hosts are very kind.
Disliked: There's nothing I don't like.

Liked: The apartment is located in a quiet street in Kapana, while all cafes and restaurants are within walking distance. Wessie is a great host, and make sure we don't miss anything during our entire stay. .The apartment is very clean and equipped with everything you need.
We have a very helpful and friendly lady here to see you. I highly recommend it, we'll do it again! .There is an underground car park.
The apartment you provided us with is proof that everything that you do with a lot of love always has a good result! Be healthy and still dedicated. And let your guests multiply!
Everything was wonderful.

Direct communication (in English) with Vessy owner and all those who serve the property (Greek, English). Closed underground parking and a second garage for your car. Clean apartment, very close to the main pedestrian street as well as the old town, quiet neighbourhood and charming apartment building. The apartment is new, fully equipped, you lack nothing (even umbrellas).!!), is beautifully decorated and feels warm and warm.The mattress is very comfortable and the sheets are spotless. Very good price in terms of location and facilities. The owner is very helpful and willing to do anything you ask.  It's the best and most convenient apartment we have left. The pictures might not do it justice!!! We would strongly recommend it.
Luxurious, cosy and impeccably clean apartment with a perfect location and wonderful owners!I recommend hot for everyone!
Clean-up, warmth, underground parking, proximity to the city, intimacy. I mean, everything.

Disliked: We had a very pleasant stay, the hosts are lovely, the apartment is new, aesthetic and fun, we were sorry to leave

Liked: Perfect hosts, an exceptional location, very good location, an indoor guarded garage, very clean! I recommend it!

It is a new apartment located in the city center, so it is quiet in a residential area. The parking lot is in the basement of the building and security is tight. There is an elevator that leads directly from the underground parking lot to the rooms. There is a large veranda, so it was nice to have a cup of coffee while watching people spending their daily lives in the morning. The owner of the house was very kind and guided me around, so I was able to stay as comfortable as a hotel. I left a pair of earrings in my apartment, and they sent it to Korea by DHL. I was very impressed. I love you Vessy‚ô•
We loved everything. No need for words. At the same time we can not finish without saying about our host Vissy - we loved you‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è
Great attitude, perfect location, and extremely clean.The apartment is equipped with everything you need for a family holiday with a child.I recommend it and I'd love to come back!
Spacious, well-equipped, clean apartment in a great location! The owner of the place is very kind and pleasant to the media. Highly recommended!
The location, the cleanliness, the modernity of the apartment and the very good reception.
Disliked: Just missing a microwave, for tourists who do not want to cook and taste the food of the Bulgarian caterers!! üòÜ

Liked: The most central place in Plovdiv :)!!!
Central location. Excellent hospitality. The lady also offered us a free city tour as well as several restaurants. A nice apartment with all the things you need.
This place is great! Clean, comfortable and comfortable in a top location. - Nice host attitude. The garage is another big plus. I highly recommend it.

Excellent location in Plovdiv, large and clean rooms, equipped with everything (just about everything you can think of iron, dishwasher, washing machine, coffee machine, oven, pan and more and more). The owner of the apartment is amazing !!! Strongly recommends!
New apartment. Perfect location.  Lovely hostess who cared we were comfortable and recommended restaurants and tours.
Location, cleanliness of the apartment ...
Disliked: Everything is OK

Liked: The stay in Plovdiv started with meeting the very friendly host couple, that their modern, very clean and well-equipped new building apartment explained to us and handed over to us for use. The location is fantastic, as you are on the edge of Kapana district really in the thick of it, but still it is very quietly located. Everything is tastefully furnished, the bathroom is spacious and clean, living room and bedroom have a working air conditioning, the kitchen is well equipped, TV with some German channels & internet (Wifi) available and there is a huge terrace. The car was absolutely safe in a double-locked underground car park (in the house!) and the elevator was directly accessible from there. There was really nothing to complain about and if the road takes us back to Plovdiv, we would book this apartment again and again.
The ideal location ,  to experience Plovdiv 2019 !

Modern and new apartment of good comfort with all the amenities. Spacious and ideally located close to tourist attractions and restaurants. Perfect welcome and assistance from the host who remains available for any information. Highly recommended.
Disliked: Everything was perfect.

Liked: We had a great time. Really nice and fully equipped apartment in a quiet area even if in the center of Plovdiv. Private garage. The owner is very kind and helpful. Stylish and comfortable apartment with all the necessary appliances, all utensils, coffee, tea, etc. Great location. An underground car park is a great comfort. Very kind and helpful hosts. I recommend it!

It is close to many cocktail bars and all the sights and shops of the city centre are within a 5-10-minute walk. We'd be delighted to stay there again.
The apartment was new, spacious and spotless. There was an underground garage. It was too close to the center! The hosts were flawless!
Well-appointed apartment with a great location and friendly owners. The underground parking space is a great comfort for this part of Plovdiv. I recommend it.
Bright, warm and cozy apartment. Excellent location. The hostess is super smiling, cooperative and positive! Everything is new, well-equipped and maintained.)

Liked: Everything: .Good room, very good breakfast, good location etc..
Good location .very clean.
Everything except the spa and wellness centre..
Disliked: The spa and wellness centre is really small and not really good..

Liked: It's a petfect place for relax or just to stay.
Good location.Exceptional value for money. Friendly, clean good spa services..
Disliked: Card keys kept not working.

Liked: magnificent breakfast.big nice and clean room .very well equiped gym.
Disliked: had a bunch of party neighbors who woke me up two times .gym had a very high temperature inside.

Liked: Excellent ! .Real know-how in the hotel industry. .Dogs friendly..

Liked: it was amazing hotel.
Disliked: nothing.

Liked: Excellent location and nice staff, they even have gluten-free meals in the restaurant. The hotel even complimented me with a room better than booked. Highly recommendable..
Disliked: The night club was not working..

Liked: The hotel was spotless, the staff were friendly and inviting. The room was beautifully presented..
Disliked: The food could have been better. I ordered a beef steak with mushroom sauce and when it can it was pale, this and tasted more like pork than beef.  To add to this, the cost for the steak and a small portion of wedges was 34 BGN.  It was not a meal worth 34 BGN, in my opinion. Sourcing a better quality meat when charging that price would be advisable..

Liked: We were traveling with my son of 9 years old.It was type of celebration of his birthday!As I have written to the hotel upfront our arrival they have done great surprise for my boy and also for me.All the staff was really professional and kind!We spent great 2days and I recommend for sure the place!.
1. Location is very close to the center .2. Staff is very friendly .3. Room is classic style, neat and clean.
team was very good.location is best.all was good .and they did send us very nice cake as jest‚ò∫Ô∏è.thank you soo much for all.
Good quiet and clean room..
Disliked: They need to add more sockets and change a hair dryer on new. The hotel need to refresh..

Liked: Excellent hotel for a city trip to plovdiv with a delicious breakfast. We enjoyed the chill atmosphere in the hotel restaurant, the beautiful city view, the big gym and the bowling..
Disliked: Nothing, everything was great..
.Disliked ¬†¬∑¬†pool and fitness are separate from the facility..

Liked: Perfect.
Disliked: SPA not included.(12BGN per person + swimming cap required).

Liked: Great hotel location, on the Maritsa river shore, big underground parking facility, beautifully room, large and very clean, great city view from the room window, few minutes walking distance from the old town and all the rest touristic attractions, many museums available at the short walking distance, full of archeological sites open air or underground, nice restaurants at the both sides of Maritsa river, old city center full of people each evening ....
Disliked: We wasn't able to dinner in the hotel restaurants (one of them was closed for renovations, or maybe dedicated to a particular event, another one is a bar with limited food choice) but there are other great restaurants very close to the hotel location..

Liked: Very well located hotel close to everything important in Plovdiv. I have enjoyed the experience..
Amazing services.
The breakfast was excellent. It was a cozy and quiet morning. Room was clean and confi. The location is perfect..
Very comfy bed.
Disliked: During pandemic, when there is a buffet for breakfast, maybe is better that the staff serves the guests, because it isn't very hygienic that everyone touches the cutlery , plates and ecc. as nobody of the guests was wearing masks..

Liked: Location is very convenient and there is a parking which is a great advantage given the busy Plovdiv center. Staff is very polite and responsive..

Disliked: .Disliked ¬†¬∑¬†The noisy neighbours.

Liked: The best in town. Everything is perfect..
Disliked: None.

Liked: Amazing friendly, polite and helpful customer service officers. The ladies were fantastic!!!! A real joy to be treated so well. Efficient, competent, helpful! .Also loved the room - nice and spacious; fantastic space and the swimming pool and steam room were excellent!.
Disliked: I loved everything except the TV - I did not have any programmes on Sunday evening as the card did not work. This is not acceptable for a hotel of such calibre..

Liked: great hotel ,perfect location , close to attractive area ..
Disliked: NIL.

Liked: room , breakfast , cleanness.
everything was great ü§ò.
Disliked: Nothing!.

Liked: Everything was Great. Staff, Rooms , Views..
Disliked: I didn't like that we stay for only 3 nights and everyday we was complaining about WiFi in our room. And theirs It Manager was saying that we have to connect with the strongest signal. We didn't have any signals at all until morning we left..

Liked: Location is perfect if you want to walk to the walking street and old town. They also have underground parking which is a real plus. The rooms have been recently renovated to a more modern style. We have stayed here several times. It is clean and comfortable with an excellent buffet breakfast. It is what you would expect from any large conference style corporate hotel..

If you can‚Äôt find anything in it‚Äôs a minute away from the hotel. The cutie center is in a walking distance. In addition - the staff is really professional - all over the hotel you see smiling staff members open when you need assistance. Also you feel absolutely incognito during your stay. Just perfect!.

But: the lobby was practically always empty, the boutiques were almost all closed during the day, the bar (without direct comfortable armchairs there, just located along the hall corridor by the hall) was almost never manned (closes at 10pm according to the information), the swimming pool costs extra admission, the Cafe Wien was always empty (even without visible staff!) etc.  .The breakfast buffet was in substance quite poor, a single (fairly dried) portion of jams in the small plastic cup, lukewarm egg porridge, lukewarm sausages, single cheese slices. Moderately friendly waiters with sad-bored faces, who immediately cleaned up the food leftovers that were not yet ready when leaving the table to catch up at the buffet, also the almost full coffee cup with the serviette. .Overall, one has the picture of the HO restaurants in the former GDR. .Conclusion: the location for tourists is quite good, rooms are clean and spacious, view of the city good, relatively cheap, but not GRAND!

My brother and I were traveling to Greece from Varna by car. We planned to stop in Plovdiv overnight, so we needed a cozy room and a parking space. SKYLER GUEST HOUSE was a perfect match. It‚Äôs located in the heart of the city in a stylishly refurbished century-old building. The room was clean, comfortable and quiet with a mini fridge. The hosts gave us a warm welcome. Liked: 1. Location - perfect for exploring Plovdiv's attractions. Walk-able distance to everything important: 2 min to Kapana restaurant area, 1 min to the main boulevard and less than 10 min to Old Town and Ancient Theater. .2. Room - huge, clean, comfortable. Simple and modern design, newly renovated. Room has great AC and mini fridge..3. WIFI - worked perfect..4. Parking - they offer paid parking (10 E/day) in their yard. This is great as the location is central and all public parking spaces are paid (via SMS with Bulgarian number - not an option for foreign tourists). It's also great you can reserve the spot and be sure you have a spot for your car (this was the main reason we chose this place). Be aware you have to request the parking spot using the tool for "request parking" on booking, not just sending a message you want one. There are only 3 spots in the yard and for longer stays it would probably be better to stay outside the central area where there's free parking, because it would be expensive. In weekends the parking is free in all Bulgaria, but we did not want to risk finding a spot too far from the guesthouse just to spare 10 E..
Disliked: 1. Had to send 2 messages via booking to receive confirmation for parking place. We depended on their answer and it would have been annoying to find out they don't have a spot for us AFTER the reservation became nonrefundable. .2. No elevator, so not for folks with impaired mobility or heavy and big lugage..

Liked: A cozy art place in the heart of old Plovdiv - Hotel Gallery 37 is the perfect opportunity to experience a rich palette of emotions.
